TextView.android:text: With this build I recommend going lethality items as it fits the best with the build. Electrocute is good for a short trade in lane and getting out like a q-w-a-e combo. It's also good for bursting your opponent with the long 45 sec cd it has but high burst damage. Go sudden impact for more lethality. Eyeball collection if you think you will snowball or else the other two options are also good. Last option is pretty much interchangable, I like ingenious with lethality items and zombie ward especially because it lowers the CD of sweeper, actives(duskblade and youmoos). I usually go sorcery second with transcendence and either scorch, nimbus cloak, nullifying, or gathering storm. For the stats I almost always go AF(adaptive force), AF, Health/Armor/MR.
